subtitle: This recipe is a good way to start a meal. Use fresh or frozen (thawed) filo pastry, but make sure it is kept covered while using it.

method.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Use individual 10 cm loose-bottomed fluted flan tins.

Lay out one sheet of filo pastry and brush with egg white. Fold in half. Brush top with egg white. Fold in half again to give a rectangle approximately 20 x 15 cm. Use to line base and sides of the first flan tin, pressing pastry into the flutes. Trim excess pastry. Repeat with remaining pastry to line all flan tins.
Bake in oven for about 8 min.
Remove pastry case from flan tins. Carefully brush outside with egg white. Return to oven, upside down on a baking sheet, for 5 min, until golden brown.

Put onion wedges in a roasting tin. Drizzle over oil. Roast in oven for 10-15 min. Stir in red pesto and mushrooms. Season to taste. Return to oven for 8-10 min. Spoon mixture into the warm filo pastry cases. Drizzle with lime juice.

title: Roasted mushrooms and onions in filo tartlets
